alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Brooks Range; Northwestern Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 11:28AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Rising Water Levels on Rivers Draining the Brooks Range... Several weather fronts moving across the central and eastern Brooks Range will bring rising water levels to rivers and streams. Rainfall totals from 0.75 to 1.75 inches are possible through Friday. Some isolated locations could see higher amounts. At this time, water levels are expected to remain within bank and below flood stage. Those traveling and recreating on rivers and streams draining the Brooks Range are encouraged to monitor water levels since some exposed gravel bars could become inundated due to runoff from the rainfall.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Brooks Range; Northwestern Brooks Range
